title: Tech Stocks Slide for Second Day on Lingering Software Fears
description: Technology stocks tumbled for a second straight day as the artificial intelligence-fueled exodus from software stocks once again spilled over into the broader market.
content: Technology stocks tumbled for a second straight day as the artificial intelligence-fueled exodus from software stocks once again spilled over into the broader market.
